data.enText: shyer
shyest
nervous or embarrassed about meeting and speaking to other people
data.chText: 羞怯的；腼腆的；怕生的

data.enText: a quiet, shy man
data.chText: 腼腆、不大说话的人

data.enText: Don't be shy─come and say hello.
data.chText: 别害羞——过来问个好。

data.enText: She was too shy to ask anyone for help.
data.chText: 她太腼腆，不愿向任何人求助。

data.enText: As a teenager I was painfully shy .
data.chText: 我十几岁的时候腼腆得很。

data.enText: She's very shy with adults.
data.chText: 她在大人面前很拘束。

data.enText: showing that sb is nervous or embarrassed about meeting and speaking to other people
data.chText: 显得腼腆的；看着羞怯的

data.enText: a shy smile
data.chText: 腼腆的微笑

data.enText: easily frightened and not willing to come near people
data.chText: 怕人的；易受惊的；胆小的

data.enText: The panda is a shy creature.
data.chText: 熊猫是一种胆小的动物。

data.enText: afraid of doing sth or being involved in sth
data.chText: 害怕（做）；对（做）…心怀顾忌

data.enText: The band has never been shy of publicity.
data.chText: 这支乐队一向不惮招摇。

data.enText: He disliked her and had never been shy of saying so.
data.chText: 他不喜欢她，而且从来不忌讳说出来。

data.enText: lacking the amount that is needed
data.chText: 欠缺；不足；未达到；不够

data.enText: He died before Christmas, only a month shy of his 90th birthday.
data.chText: 他在圣诞节前去世了，仅差一个月就满90岁。

data.enText: We are still two players shy (of a full team).
data.chText: （凑成一支队）我们还缺两名队员。

data.enText: avoiding or not liking the thing mentioned
data.chText: 躲避（或不喜欢）…的

data.enText: camera-shy (= not liking to be photographed)
data.chText: 不爱照相

data.enText: He's always been work-shy.
data.chText: 他总是躲避工作。

data.enText: once bitten, twice shy
after an unpleasant experience you are careful to avoid sth similar
data.chText: 一朝被蛇咬，十年怕井绳

data.enText: shies
shying
shied
shied
to turn away with a sudden movement because it is afraid or surprised
data.chText: 被吓退；被惊走

data.enText: My horse shied at the unfamiliar noise.
data.chText: 这陌生的声音把我的马惊了。

data.enText: shy away (from sth)
to avoid doing sth because you are nervous or frightened
data.chText: 畏避；回避；躲避；避免做

data.enText: Hugh never shied away from his responsibilities.
data.chText: 该自己承担的责任，休从不回避。

data.enText: The newspapers have shied away from investigating the story.
data.chText: 各家报纸纷纷退避，不敢调查详情。

data.enText: shy away (from sth)
to avoid doing sth because you are nervous or frightened
data.chText: 畏避；回避；躲避；避免做

data.enText: Hugh never shied away from his responsibilities.
data.chText: 该自己承担的责任，休从不回避。

data.enText: The newspapers have shied away from investigating the story.
data.chText: 各家报纸纷纷退避，不敢调查详情。

trans: （因害怕或信心不足而）回避，躲避，避免

data.enText: fight shy of sth/of doing sth
to be unwilling to accept sth or do sth, and to try to avoid it
data.chText: 不愿接受（或做）某事；回避；躲避

data.enText: Successive governments have fought shy of such measures.
data.chText: 一届接一届政府均不愿采取这些措施。

data.enText: once bitten, twice shy
after an unpleasant experience you are careful to avoid sth similar
data.chText: 一朝被蛇咬，十年怕井绳

example: he gave the ball a shy to the first baseman

tr: disposed to avoid persons or things

example: stood in the doorway diffident and abashed
problems that call for bold not timid responses

example.ex: She was a shy, quiet-spoken girl...
example.tran: 她是个害羞、说话轻声细语的女孩。

example.ex: She was a shy and retiring person off-stage...
example.tran: 她在现实生活中是个腼腆而且不善社交的人。

example.ex: He is painfully shy of women.
example.tran: 他见到女人就十分害羞。

value.def: A shy person is nervous and uncomfortable in the company of other people.

example.tran: 最终他克服了自己的羞怯。

example.ex: You should not be shy of having your say in the running of the school.
example.tran: 在管理学校方面，你应该毫无顾忌地发表你的意见。

value.def: If you are shy of doing something, you are unwilling to do it because you are afraid of what might happen.
value.tran: 犹豫的;不情愿的;害怕的;有所顾忌的

example.ex: Llewelyn's stallion shied as the wind sent sparks flying.
example.tran: 风一吹来，火星四溅，卢埃林的种马惊跳起来。

value.def: When a horse shies, it moves away suddenly, because something has frightened it.
You say 'once bitten, twice shy' when you want to indicate that someone will not do something a second time because they had a bad experience the first time they did it.
value.tran: 一朝被蛇咬，十年怕井绳;一回吃亏两回学乖

example.ex: It is no use fighting shy of publicity and then complaining when sponsors pass us by...
example.tran: 一边对做宣传避之不及，一边又抱怨赞助人与我们擦身而过，这样做是没有用的。

example.ex: Until now television had fought shy of covering by-elections.
example.tran: 迄今为止电视台一直竭力避免报道补缺选举。

value.def: If you fight shy of something, you try very hard to avoid it.

example.ex: ...a high-school dropout rate just shy of 53%...
He died two days shy of his 95th birthday.
example.tran: 他在离 95 岁寿辰仅差两天时去世了。

value.def: A number or amount that is just shy of another number or amount is just under it.

trans: （因害怕或信心不足而）回避，躲避，避免
避开；避免接触；避开回避；回避；避开,回避
害羞的女孩；含羞草；害羞女孩
